overview:
COO / Investor Relations, ID-ography. Our suite of patented technologies has both breadth and depth. It will revolutionize the way we communicate on mobile devices. “Never carry a business card, update your contacts, or dial a number again.”

One tap entry into conference calls–no 800 numbers, no PINs either. Rejoin a dropped call with one tap on your mobile device. Call/message by any identity without revealing your number.

I’ve launched multiple corporations in a variety of sectors; built teams to solve problems and eliminate pains of the masses. Serve on several boards, chairman of one. Attended UPenn, Lehigh, Harvard.
